#id=1
#text=As I got out of the shower and looked in the mirror today I realized that my hair was getting quite shaggy and long .
#id=2
#text=I think that it was time for a brand new hair cut !
#id=3
#text=I went down to the barber shop and just as I should of known , coming in on a Saturday was not one of my most brightest ideas in hindsight .
#id=4
#text=There was quite a crowd , but I figured I was already here so I might as well just wait .
#id=5
#text=I went over and put my name down under my barber , Bill , who has been cutting my hair for the past 10 years .
#id=6
#text=As I waited I grabbed a Sports Illustrated and sat down and began to read how the Pirates were doing in the World Series .
#id=7
#text=After about 20 minutes or so Bill called my name up and asked me what kind of hair cut I wanted .
#id=8

#text=I told him to stick with the usual and he put the big barber apron around me and began to cut my hair while we talked about life and caught up on what has been going on since the last time I saw him , which was about a month ago .
#id=9
#text=Afterwards my haircut was done and I looked great !
#text=We went up to the register and I paid him and gave him a good tip , then was on my way .
